extends BaseClient

    • 构造器详细资料

      • UserClient

        public UserClient(java.lang.String appkey,
          java.lang.String masterSecret)
        Create a User Client with default parameters.
        参数:
        appkey - The key of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.

      • UserClient

        public UserClient(java.lang.String appkey,
          java.lang.String masterSecret,
          HttpProxy proxy)
        Create a User Client with a proxy.
        参数:
        appkey - The key of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        proxy - The proxy, if there is no proxy, should be null.

      • UserClient

        public UserClient(java.lang.String appkey,
          java.lang.String masterSecret,
          HttpProxy proxy,
          JMessageConfig config)
        Create a User Client with custom config. If you are using JMessage privacy cloud or custom parameters, maybe this constructor is what you needed.
        参数:
        appkey - The key of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        proxy - The proxy, if there is no proxy, should be null.
        config - The client configuration. Can use JMessageConfig.getInstance() as default.

                         boolean disable)
                           throws APIConnectionException,
                                  APIRequestException
        Forbid or activate user
        参数:
        username - username
        disable - true means forbid, false means activate
        返回:
        No content
        抛出:
        APIConnectionException - connect exception
        APIRequestException - request exception
